summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to mitigating the impacts of the West Point treatment plant; authorizing and ratifying a Memorandum of Agreement between the City and King County; accepting funds from King County for deposit into the Shoreline Park Improvement Fund; increasing an appropriation to the Department of Parks and Recreation in the 2004 Budget; and amending the 2004-2009 Capital Improvement Program by creating a new capital program and projects; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
